rows.label: qst201318_msg0001
rows.name:
Mouftar! Thank goodness
you're all right!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0002
rows.name: Mommy!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, that's one family
happily reunited.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0004
rows.name:
Yes... A smile on a child's face
is always a wonderful sight.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0005
rows.name:
Thank you so much for
bringing my boy back home!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0006
rows.name:
We only did what any upstanding
individual would do.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0007
rows.name:
There's just one thing we'd like
to ask - do you remember anything
at all about how he went missing?

rows.label: qst201318_msg0008
rows.name: Yes... It was in the early morning.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0009
rows.name:
I had some business at the
shops in Elmos Square, so I
brought him along with me.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0010
rows.name:
But when I took my eyes off him
for a moment, he had vanished...

rows.label: qst201318_msg0011
rows.name: I'm so glad he came home safe!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0012
rows.name: Hey, nice lady!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0013
rows.name: Yes? What is it, my dear?

rows.label: qst201318_msg0014
rows.name:
Um, listen! I think I
remembered something!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0020
rows.name:
Someone took me to Genbu
Port and put me on a boat!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0015
rows.name: Are you sure?

rows.label: qst201318_msg0016
rows.name:
Uh-huh. But then I had to drink
something funny and I fell asleep,
so I don't remember anything else.

rows.label: qst201318_msg0017
rows.name: That's more than enough. Thank you!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0018
rows.name: No problem!

rows.label: qst201318_msg0019
rows.name:
Genbu Port in the early morning...
We should go and have a look.
